data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 30302, Version Hash: db622561b65eae5128bc8eab9db7679a4527c3fb
data.actual_result: The "language" and "select a language" text changed to English first before changing to the new language
data.expected_result: The "language" and "select a language" text should change between the 2 languages, without going to English first
data.short_description: Changing language will change the "select a language" panel text to English quickly
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the language changer in settings - Change your language to non-English - Get ready to observe the "language" and "select a language" text at the top of the language changer panel - Change your language to a different non-English language - The "language" and "select a language" text should be English for a split second
